title: Waiting over an hour for Ranked.
body: 20 Minutes because I afk'd because of a troll on my team, 45+ minutes wait que for ranked. Sick of this.

replies.body:
Hey there Skryte,

While I understand how frustrating playing a game with a troll on your team can be, leaving/afk'ing harms the experience further for the rest of your team.

Next time such an issue occurs you should just keep playing, ignore the trolling player and stay positive. It's not over until it's over. (Don't forget to report them after the game ends if they continue)

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Yeh I wish it was that easy. Doesn't help how incredibly Frustrating, Tilted, aggravating waiting 20 minutes FIVE times is. Bit excessive.
Oh, and If i leave the que to reset it, I will have to wait another 20 and the 20 minutes I already waited wouldn't even count. What a Joke.
